title: Dinendal, Silent Scout (3U12)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Ally • Home 6 • Elf
Strength:	3
Vitality:	3
Site:	6
Game Text:	Archer. Regroup: Exert Dinendal to remove (2).
Lore:	“He was almost certain that he could hear stealthy movements…. Not Elves; for the woodland folk were altogether noiseless in their movements.”
Rarity:	U
